field.name: description
field.p: Checking Customer is existing or not. If customer exist override the data else created

record.field: Do you want to override the data?

field.name: description
field.p: Some general information about you. It will be used internally for statistics only.

record.field: Location: HO, Administration, Accounts, and Factory:
Year and Date of company registration:
Any significant change in the ownership, capital structure, activities, volume of business, expected during the current year?
Any ongoing litigation against the company or directors?
Policy Procedure Manuals (for e.g. Procurement, Sales, Accounts, and Manual of Authority /Job description / system for performance approval etc.)?
Would our travel be required outside Muscat?
Whether reports are required in Arabic also ?
Are the accounts for each division/(activity) done separately and then consolidated?
Are there any other company/establishment whose accounts are consolidated with your accounts?

field.name: description
field.p: Who referred you to Crowe Oman (Crowe Mak Ghazali LLC)?

record.field: Value of intellectual property if any:
Value of intangible assets if any:
Does the company have a practice of carrying out Interim audit?
Amount of loan and other facilities, if any:
Do you come under the category of customers under obligation to submit audited balance sheet within four months of the year end?
No. of payment vouchers in a year:
No. of invoices in a year
No. of cheques issued in a year
Amount of Government/ODB loans if any
No. of employees in the Accounts Department
Year of latest tax return filed
Are there any carried forward loosses?
Any appeals pending with tax authorities
No. Of members of the audit committee
Relevant department Head - Professional qualifications and Experience
Number of branches, with locations of the branches
No. of purchase invoices in a year
No. of sales invoices in a year
Volume of exports (to outside GCC). Which countries company exports?
Volume of imports (from outside GCC). Which countries company imports?
Volume of Sales to other GCC countries
Volume of purchases form other GCC countries
If entity is part of the group please provide details of Shareholding/controlling interest details with group entity nature of business.
Can IT system be upgraded for VAT implementation?
Customer base. Sales to (Please mark all that apply)
